comment._content:
Leaving New York City to join the German Army in Europe.

Another Bain/LOC photo of German reservists leaving New York City:

comment.author: 15283643@N04
comment._content: The bus on the right is a De Dion-Bouton [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3738796499]

comment.author: 15283643@N04
comment._content: Doh! On the right in both photos.

comment.author: 51177259@N07
comment._content: Actually this is not Broadway but 5th Avenue. We are looking south from the 30th Street intersection. Many of the buildings in the foreground still exist. The Flatiron building is visible in the background (behind the De Dion-Bouton Bus on far-right). We have mapped it on SepiaTown if anyone wants to take a look.... [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51177259@N07/5996353410/in/photostream] sepiatown.com/813337/German-Reservists-March-up-5th-Avenue
